@@ -42,1 +42,5 @@ - private final int size = 1024; + + //read less or more than internal buffer size of 8192 bytes + @Param({"1024", "16384"}) + private int size; + @@ -52,0 +56,9 @@ + /** + * Read all bytes from an instance of {@link BufferedInputStream} + *

+ * This benchmark demonstrates lazy instantiation of inner {@code byte[]}, + * which is not created when we call {@code InputStream.readAllBytes()} + *

+ * @see JDK-8304745 + * @see Pull request for JDK-8304745 + */ @@ -60,0 +73,10 @@ + /** + * Read all bytes from an instance of {@link BufferedInputStream} + * wrapping another instance of {@link BufferedInputStream}. + *

+ * This benchmark demonstrates lazy instantiation of inner {@code byte[]}, + * which is not created when we call {@code InputStream.readAllBytes()} + *

+ * @see JDK-8304745 + * @see Pull request for JDK-8304745 + */
